channel.title: Talks & Events on NeuroTechHub
channel.description: Recent content in Talks & Events on NeuroTechHub

item.title: Neural Signal Processing Workshop: From Raw Data to Insights
item.description: Learn practical techniques for processing neural signals, from preprocessing to feature extraction and classification.

item.title: The Future of Neural Interfaces: Beyond Brain-Computer
item.description: A visionary talk exploring the next decade of neural interface technology, from therapeutic applications to human enhancement.
